[`init<T>(T)`](/documentation/swift/int32/init(_:)-47iba)Creates a new instance from the given integer.[`init?<T>(exactly: T)`](/documentation/swift/int32/init(exactly:)-7er6b)### [Type Properties](/documentation/Swift/Int32/SignedInteger-Implementations#Type-Properties)

[`static var isSigned: Bool`](/documentation/swift/int32/issigned)A Boolean value indicating whether this type is a signed integer type.[`static var max: Self`](/documentation/swift/int32/max)The maximum representable integer in this type.[`static var min: Self`](/documentation/swift/int32/min)The minimum representable integer in this type.
